item.title: When people click "wear" skill cape
item.dc:creator: @barrage_time barrage time
item.description:
@barrage_time wrote:

Obviously he wants to know the code to be able to do this.
Here is the code Zombiedevice,

if(playerLevel[0] < 99) { if((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14073) || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14074) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 14075)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerCape); remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerHat); sendMessage("You need level 99 Attack to ware this cape."); } } if(playerLevel[1] < 99) { if((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14076) || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14077) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 14075)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerCape); remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerHat); sendMessage("You need level 99 Strength to wear this cape."); } } if(playerLevel[2] < 99) { if((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14079) || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14080) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 14081)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerCape); remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerHat); sendMessage("You need level 99 Defence to wear this cape."); } } if(playerLevel[3] < 99) { if((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14094) || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14095) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 14096)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerCape); remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerHat); sendMessage("You need level 99 Hitpoints to wear this cape."); } } if(playerLevel[4] < 99) { if((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14082) || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14083) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 14084)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerCape); remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerHat); sendMessage("You need level 99 Range to wear this cape."); } } if(playerLevel[5] < 99) { if((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14085) || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14086) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 14087)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerCape); remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerHat); sendMessage("You need level 99 Prayer to wear this cape."); } } if(playerLevel[6] < 99) { if((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14088) || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14089) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 14090)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerCape); remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerHat); sendMessage("You need level 99 Magic to wear this cape."); } } if(playerLevel[7] < 99) { if((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14127) || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14128) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 14129)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerCape); remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerHat); sendMessage("You need level 99 Cooking to wear this cape."); } } if(playerLevel[8] < 99) { if((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14133) || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14134) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 14135)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerCape); remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerHat); sendMessage("You need level 99 WoodCutting to wear this cape."); } } if(playerLevel[9] < 99) { if((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14109) || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14110) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 14111)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerCape); remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerHat); sendMessage("You need level 99 Fletching to wear this cape."); } } if(playerLevel[10] < 99) { if((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14124) || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14125) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 14126)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerCape); remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerHat); sendMessage("You need level 99 Fishing to wear this cape."); } } if(playerLevel[11] < 99) { if((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14130) || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14131) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 14132)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerCape); remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerHat); sendMessage("You need level 99 Firemaking to wear this cape."); } } if(playerLevel[12] < 99) { if((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14106) || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14107) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 14108)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerCape); remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerHat); sendMessage("You need level 99 Crafting to wear this cape."); } } if(playerLevel[13] < 99) { if((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14121) || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14122) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 14123)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerCape); remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerHat); sendMessage("You need level 99 Smithing to wear this cape."); } } if(playerLevel[14] < 99) { if((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14118) || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14119) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 14120)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerCape); remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerHat); sendMessage("You need level 99 Mining to wear this cape."); } } if(playerLevel[15] < 99) { if((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14094) || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14095) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 14096)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerCape); remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerHat); sendMessage("You need level 99 Theiving to wear this cape."); } } if(playerLevel[18] < 99) { if((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14112 || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14113) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 14114))) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerCape); remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerHat); sendMessage("You need level 99 Slayer to wear this cape."); } } if(playerLevel[19] < 99) { if((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14136) || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14137) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 14138)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerCape); remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerHat); sendMessage("You need level 99 Farming to wear this cape."); } } if(playerLevel[20] < 99) { if((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14091) || (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14092) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 14093)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], playerCape); remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], playerHat); sendMessage("You need level 99 Runecrafting to wear this cape."); } }

Hope it helped.
